description.value: The profile [zib-ContactPoint-TelephoneNumbers](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-ContactPoint-TelephoneNumbers) maps the TelephoneNumbers concept from zib ContactInformation in the FHIR datatype _ContactPoint_. However, this concept cannot entirely represented. This extension binds the zib ValueSet TelecomTypeCodelijst to this profile.

purpose.value: This extension represents the TelecomType concept [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) ContactInformation v1.2(2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/ContactInformation-v1.2(2020EN)).
